column1: All content below is taken in its entirety from the CDC Serogroup B Meningococcal Vaccine Information Statement (VIS): www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/vis/vis-statements/mening-serogroup.html CDC review information for Serogroup B Meningococcal Vaccine (MenB): - Page last reviewed: August 14, 2015 - Page last updated: August 14, 2015 - Issue date of VIS: August 14, 2015 Content source: National Center for Immunization and Respiratory Diseases
